title: Champion Mastery Level 7 Visual Bug on Nautilus

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Visual Bug while Displaying the Level 7 Champion Mastery on {{champion:111}} . Gif in Description. Health bar/Name Plate is in the way.

replies.body:
Hi hi! 

Thanks for the report! I know the team who handles the mastery system is aware that some health bars are covering mastery emotes a bit. While I don't have an ETA on a fix for this, I'd be happy to poke them and give them a friendly reminder that this is still occurring and you aren't able to BM (read: show off your skills). :)

Well, im sorry to bump the thread, but its 2017-04 and the issue still wasnt fixed, i remember it was said in some patch notes or somewhere that it was fixed, but in reality it wasnt. Both 6 and 7th mastery are still covered by the hp bar. Cmon guys, you can do it :D

Hi

Thanks for the quick answer and your help. 
Much appreciated :)

PLease fix it 8 MONTH AGO !!!! 

ty <3
It happens on level 6 as well. Please fix
Pretty sure this is a bug with the mastery 7 itself and not just nautilus,  as this seems to occur on many champions
